law.catch_line: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated....

text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Biodiesel" means an alternative motor fuel produced from a renewable resource such as vegetable oil or animal fat.
"Board" means the Renewable Fuels Incentive Board.
"Ethanol" means fermented ethyl alcohol derived from agricultural or forest products.

section.section: "Small grains" means a winter grain crop.
"Small grains" includes wheat, rye, triticale, oats, and hulled or hull-less barley.
